title: Bell Potter on healthcare raising blitz
text:
It's a busy day for Bell Potter in the healthcare sector.

The broker kicked off two capital raisings on Thursday, one for molecular diagnostics company Genetic Signatures Limited and the other for biotech firm Kazia Therapeutics.

Bell Potter has kicked off two raisings in the healthcare space. Nick Walker

Genetic Signatures is looking to raise $35 million via a two tranche placement at an offer price of 98¢, which is a 9.3 per cent discount its last close of $1.08. Bids are due by Thursday at 4pm.

The company will use the equity to expand its global sales team, pay for regulatory approval processes and fund R &D, according to terms sent to fund managers.

Genetic Signatures has developed technologies to diagnose infectious diseases.
description: Bell Potter has kicked off two raisings for company's in the healthcare sector.
